name: Python Team Lead
description:
THE SCHAFFHAUSEN INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY (SIT) is a research-led institution located in Schaffhausen, Switzerland. Founded by world-renowned entrepreneurs, led by leading scientists and researchers, SIT's mission is to train the next generation of global leaders, solve some of the world's biggest problems with science, and transform the future.

SIT provides research, knowledge, and education in three broad areas of advanced technology: Computer Science, Physics, and Technology Transformation and is comprised of several companies (SIT Alemira, SIT Autonomous, SIT Capital, SIT Programming School, SIT StartGarden).

SIT ALEMIRA is a completely digital and software ecosystem for universities, research facilities, boot camps, and corporate education. Our unique Active Learning ecosystem features an AI-powered learning and authoring platform, data-driven, collaborative research and modeling tools, active educational content from world-class scientists, and organizational transformation consulting services.

We are seeking an enthusiastic and self-motivated leader to join our Engineering team to work on a large-scale, complex system that offers innovative educational technologies to various universities, research institutes, boot camps, and companies. You will be using a modern technology stack and working in a cross-functional environment that promotes collaboration within/across teams, both with internal/external stakeholders.

DUTIES & RESPONSIBILIITIES:

  • Designing, developing, and maintaining reliable and scalable services for the cloud-based digital learning ecosystem
  • Building and leading a high-performing team through effective hiring and coaching
  • Creating and executing the engineering roadmap
  • Establishing the technical strategy and constructing a scalable architecture with modern distributed application software that meets the overall business requirements.
  • Willing to roll up sleeves and get into the codebase. We expect roughly 50%/50% for management vs writing/reviewing the code for team lead positions.
  • Providing technical direction on all software development activities.
QUALIFICATION & EXPERIENCE:
  • At least 5 years working experience in software/product engineering in fast-paced environments
  • At least 2 years of experience in a senior-level engineering management role, leading a team of engineers and driving large-scale projects and products, in collaboration with product, design, and commercial teams
  • Excellent stakeholder management and a deep understanding of Agile methodology
  • Profound knowledge of current technological trends, backend (Python), frontend, Microservices, UI development, Cloud, DevOps, Data Engineering, Databases, etc.
  • Experienced in backend, architecture and infrastructure, and web services
  • Excellent Solution Architect skills, from Product team collaboration to Database/System design and production performance analysis/tuning with infrastructure engineering team
  • Open-minded and pragmatic approach in picking up the most suitable and cost-effective solutions (cloud vs bare-metal, micro-services vs monolith etc.)
  • Good understanding of both bare-metal and modern cloud stack infrastructure, hardware/network etc.
  • Strong communication skills with the ability to work with individuals from multiple domains, from product owners to 3rd party partners
  • Ability to multitask and prioritize effectively
WHAT WE OFFER:
  • Competitive salary
  • Comprehensive health insurance from the first day of employment (including your kids under 14).
  • Lunch allowance in the amount of 400 RUB gross per working day is included in your monthly paycheck.
  • Co-working fees coverage
  • Individual English classes compensation and intensive practice in the international environment
  • Choice of work equipment ( i.e. laptop, monitor, etc)
  • 100% remote work, flexible schedule
  • 10 days per year of fully paid sick leave
